name: Ball out (itch) (marcnt)
description:
You enter a huge complex, but something seemingly magical caused you to turn into a ball. Now, you are locked inside and you have to find a way out of the place so you can become normal again.

Your goal is to find the key by navigating through a series of obstacles and mechanisms.

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • Space - jump
  • Left click - interact
  • Escape - pause game

a one man game

  • marcnt (https://marcnt.itch.io/)
